import axios from"axios";export default{registerUser:function registerUser(user){return axios.post("/auth/register",user);},findUser:function findUser(user){return axios.post("/auth/login",user);},//this function should use axios to call url from server to get the data from database 
getUserInfoFromDB:function getUserInfoFromDB(email){return axios.get("/api/getUserInfo/"+email);},updateSkills:function updateSkills(skills,id){var data={skills:skills,id:id};console.log(data);return axios.post("/api/updateSkills/",data);},saveImage:function saveImage(image,email){var file={file:image,email:email};console.log(file);return axios.post("/api/saveimage",file);},updateAddress:function updateAddress(data){return axios.post("/api/updateAdress",data);},saveBid:function saveBid(user,priceNumber,status,jobId){var data={user:user,priceNumber:priceNumber,status:status,jobId:jobId};return axios.post("/api/savebid",data);}};
